title: Singapore Holds Policy Steady, While Raising Inflation Forecast
description: Singapore left its monetary policy settings unchanged for a third straight review, while raising its forecast for inflation in a signal that its next move may be a tightening.
content: Singapore left its monetary policy settings unchanged for a third straight review, while raising its forecast for inflation in a signal that its next move may be a tightening.
